perturbation.original_text:
Within 30 days of the end of each quarter during the term of this agreement, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT shall receive from THE HENRY FILM
AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, a detailed accounting statement showing Net Due and Paid Shared Revenues for that quarter and shall
remit to PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT its share of such revenues.
perturbation.changed_text:
Within 60 days of the end of each quarter during the term of this agreement, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT shall receive from THE HENRY FILM
AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, a detailed accounting statement showing Net Due and Paid Shared Revenues for that quarter and shall
remit to PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT its share of such revenues.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by modifying the payment deadline from 30 days to 60 days. This introduces uncertainty regarding when payments are officially due and could lead to disputes over late payment penalties or breach of contract.

perturbation.original_text:
PERFORMANCE: In lieu of PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT granting a 10 year Exclusive Content License to THE HENRY FILM AND
ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION agrees to share a minimum of $50,000.00
annually for each year of this Agreement. In the event of THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, not fulfilling this minimum
PERFORMANCE, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT may cancel this Agreement
perturbation.changed_text:
PERFORMANCE: In lieu of PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT granting a 10 year Exclusive Content License to THE HENRY FILM AND
ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION agrees to share a minimum of $50,000.00
annually for the first five years of this Agreement. In the event of THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION, not fulfilling this minimum
PERFORMANCE, PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT may cancel this Agreement
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction related to the 'PERFORMANCE' clause. Initially, the minimum annual revenue share of $50,000 applied 'for each year' of the agreement. Now, it applies only for 'the first five years'. This creates uncertainty regarding the minimum revenue share obligation for the remaining five years, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.changed_text:
"Affiliates” shall mean any company or any other entity worldwide, including, without limitation, corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and
Limited Liability Companies, in which THE HENRY FILM AND ENTERTAINMENT CORPORATION owns at least a twenty-five percent ownership, equity,
or financial interest.
perturbation.explanation: This modification changes the definition of 'Affiliates' from a 5% ownership threshold to a 25% ownership threshold. This introduces a direct contradiction, making it unclear which entities qualify as affiliates. This discrepancy impacts clauses related to indemnification (page 3), as the scope of protection depends on the definition of 'Affiliate'. It also affects potential future negotiations (page 4) and overall risk allocation.
